title: Friedrich Merz puts Germany in an unfamiliar position: Out front – POLITICO
snippet: If we do not succeed in this, the European Union’s ability to act will be severely damaged for years, if not for a longer period,” Merz said on Monday. “And we will show the world that, at such a crucial moment in our history, we are incapable of standing together and acting to defend our own political order on this European continent.” · Friedrich Merz’s predecessors, Olaf Scholz and Angela Merkel, were reluctant to put the country in such an outspoken lead role internationally or within the EU.

title: Friedrich Merz – DW
snippet: In his first visit to Israel as chancellor, Merz affirms Germany's support while addressing civilian suffering in Gaza ... German Chancellor Friedrich Merz is in Israel for talks with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

title: Friedrich Merz | PBS News
snippet: Germany’s center-left Social Democrats have approved a deal to join a new coalition government, paving the way for parliament to elect conservative leader Friedrich Merz as the country’s new chancellor. ... Subscribe to Here’s the Deal, our politics newsletter for analysis you won’t ...
